name: Halloween Movie Calendar
description: A Halloween calendar that suggests a movie to watch every day for the month of October.

name: Campground Mapper
description: Wanderlust America provides travelers with a curated listing of the top 10 campsites in each of the 50 states.

name: Bobby's Hobbies
description: This is an art where only a pen and paper are needed.

name: Employee Management System
description: The user updates employee information, roles, and departments all by following the steps in the terminal.

name: Devour The Burger
description: Using a database, this app allows the user to enter a burger, 'eat it' and then it's added to a list of eaten burgers.

name: Note Taker
description: A simple note taking page that takes the input of a user and allows them to come back later and view their notes.

name: Password Generator
description: This simple app allows the user to quickly generate a password according to their preference.

name: Daily Planner
description: A daily workday scheduler for the busy professional.

name: Readme Generator
description: Using node, this app quickly creates a readme for your coding project needs.

name: Team Generator
description: This app also uses node so the user can add all of their team members to a webpage.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This app was created to populate any weather forecast a user wishes to see.

name: Employee Directory
description: Using React, this app allows the user to sort employees by first & last name as well as search for a specific employee.
